services.name: Exterior Hand Wash
services.description: Thorough washing of the car’s exterior using hand washing techniques.

services.name: Interior Vacuuming
services.description: Vacuuming the seats, carpets, and floor mats to remove dirt and debris.

services.name: Waxing and Polishing
services.description: Applying wax and polish to protect and enhance the shine of the car’s paint.

services.name: Tire and Wheel Cleaning
services.description: Cleaning and shining the tires and wheels.

services.name: Leather Cleaning and Conditioning
services.description: Cleaning and conditioning leather seats and surfaces.

services.name: Window Cleaning
services.description: Cleaning the inside and outside of the car windows.

services.name: Engine Detailing
services.description: Cleaning the engine bay to remove dirt, grease, and grime.

services.name: Headlight Restoration
services.description: Restoring the clarity of foggy or yellowed headlights.
